mapper.insert: insert into interviewee_info (position_id, interviewee_name, interviewee_age, interviewee_gender, interviewee_education_background, interviewee_graduate_institution, interviewee_major, interviewee_phone, flag) values (#{positionId}, #{intervieweeName}, #{intervieweeAge}, #{intervieweeGender}, #{intervieweeEductionBackground}, #{intervieweeGraduateInsititution}, #{intervieweeMajor}, #{intervieweePhone}, 1)
mapper.update: update interview set flag = 0 where interviewId=#{interviewId}
mapper.select: select interviewee_id, interviewee_info.position_id, position_name, interviewee_name, interviewee_age, interviewee_gender, interviewee_education_background, interviewee_graduate_institution, interviewee_major, interviewee_phone from interviewee_info inner join empty_position on interviewee_info.position_id=empty_position.position_id where interviewee_info.flag=1
